summary: Contoso Wireless offers customers a variety of upgrade options, including a Buy Now Pay Later program, trade-ins, and refurbished phones. They offer a wide range of devices, including iPhones, Samsungs, Alcatel and LG models, tablets, and smartwatches. They also provide warranties and protection plans for all their devices, with costs ranging from $5-$10 per month. Customers also have access to 24/7 customer service and an extensive library of online tutorials and FAQs.
